programme.title: Laws Doomed from the Start
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke explores how an electric golf buggy altered the US disability law.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke explores how one man’s use of an electric golf buggy altered the meaning of a US disability law and remembers the UK’s struggle with daylight saving.
